idea:
DWM Innovations Private Limited provide innovation and management consulting services with the core objectives to:


1. Create awareness around the fact that innovation can be:

done systematically

an acquired skill

an element of organisation’s culture


2. Inspire people to leverage systematic approach of innovation for disproportionate growth; it can be leveraged by:

Individuals to transform their career

Organisations to transform their business


3. To provide a framework for individuals and organisations to:

Assess their current state of competency/ maturity/ readiness to leverage innovation for disproportionate growth

Aspire to the next higher levels

They can be certified for each of these levels as well


4. To provide navigational support to individuals and organisations to move from their current to aspired states in the mutually aligned timeframe.


The core differentiator of these services are that these are not based on any one particular approach but a combination of approaches which are most suitable for the particular context.


The venture, apart from generating employment within its own institution will also encourage more entrepreneurs to partner with it to deliver the services. Thus, having a snow-balling effect of not just employment by also transformative growth in almost all industrial sectors and functional domains.
name: DWM INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are involved in coal transportation work and having experience around 3-4 year in this field , We have successfully completed couple of work orders with corporates like Adani Power Rajasthan Ltd & Essar Steel Pvt Ltd under banner of “M/s .Aai Renuka Devi Enterprises”. idea:
Data Entry and Data Processing Services

At Get IT Done!, we provide our customers with highly accurate Data Entry and Data Processing services.

Our customers regularly outsource their Data Entry work to us because of our high level of accuracy, timely deliveries and total confidentiality. In the case of data entry services, the data is re-keyed to provide 99.99% accuracy.

Outsourcing of non-core but sensitive and critical data processing functions to Get IT Done! has reduced costs, increased profitability and delivered greater core value and operational excellence to our customers.

Outsource Voice Transcription Services to Get IT Done!

Are you looking to transcribe your voice files into text formats? Are you looking for a transcription partner who can provide you with accurate voice transcription services at a cost-effective price? If so call Get IT Done! today. At Get IT Done! you can get access to experienced transcribers and state-of-the-art digital transcription technology.

Over the years, we have provided accurate voice transcription services to customers across the world. Our voice transcription customers have been more than satisfied with our services, because we can provide accurately transcribed documents within a quick turnaround time. Choose Get as your voice transcription partner and give your business a competitive edge.

Why outsource voice transcription services to Get IT Done?

At Get IT Done!, we realize the importance of criticality of transcription services in healthcare, engineering, legal, media and marketing industries. This deep understanding has led us to grow into one of the biggest transcription firms. We have successfully accepted this challenge in retaining our position in the industry by suitably modifying our transcription methodology to achieve high accuracy outputs at incredibly quick turnaround times.

We take excessive efforts in hiring the best workforce in the industry. Most of our transcribers are experienced in their field of interest. These professionals are thoroughly committed and pride over 1000 hours of transcription experience individually.

In order to improve your customer experience we have incorporated extremely secure and flexible data upload and download methods. You could use one of the following methods to send us files for transcription; dictate into a hand-held recorder, dictate directly into out toll-free number or upload your voice files into our secure FTP server. Once transcription is complete you can download the text files from the FTP server.

We accept data in a variety of audio and video formats like .wav, .mpeg, .aac, .dss, .au, .vid, .avi and .mov. In case the media files are highly influenced by poor recording or background noise, you would be charged a nominal fee to enhance these files to make them suitable for quick transcription. The textual output can be saved in any one of the file formats like .doc, .pdf, .frm, .pmd and .html.
name: Get IT Done! Processing Services LLP

idea: Dataholic Analytics Private Limited is a data analytics solution provider driven with the ideology of providing automated and efficient business decision making solutions. We strive to provide the best business solutions using artificial intelligence and machine learning backed by our deep understanding of industries and their best practices. We aim at providing a competitive advantage to entities in order to scale up their existing businesses and improve their customer experience with state-of-the-art customized analytical solutions.
